articles.title: Noise Air Buds Pro TWS Earphones With Active Noise Cancellation, Quad Mics, 20-Hour Playtime Launched in ... - NDTV
articles.description: Noise Air Buds Pro TWS earbuds have been launched in India. The earbuds are available in three colour options and come with quad mics. The TWS earbuds can deliver up to 20 hours of battery life along with the charging case.
